arts.ttl: Liverpool XI vs Man City – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool travel to the Etihad Stadium today with their season firmly back on track. After a disastrous four-game losing streak in the league, the champions have bounced back well. First, they beat Aston Villa. Then, they secured a massive 1-0 midweek win over Real Madrid. Consequently, this is a vital match for the Reds.
